name: io.github.dappierai/dappier-mcp
description: Enable fast, free real-time web search and access premium data from trusted media brandsâ€”news, financial markets, sports, entertainment, weather, and more. Build powerful AI agents with Dappier.

tools.name: dappier_real_time_search
tools.description: Retrieves direct answers to real-time queries using AI-powered search. This includes web search results, financial information, news, weather, stock market updates, and more.

query.description: The user-provided input string for retrieving real-time data.

ai_model_id.description: The AI model ID to use for the query. Defaults to am_01j06ytn18ejftedz6dyhz2b15 (Real-Time Data).

tools.name: dappier_ai_recommendations
tools.description: Provides AI-powered content recommendations based on structured data models. Returns a list of articles with titles, summaries, images, and source URLs.

query.description: The user-provided input string for AI recommendations.

data_model_id.description: The data model ID to use for recommendations. Defaults to dm_01j0pb465keqmatq9k83dthx34 (Sports News).

similarity_top_k.description: The number of top documents to retrieve based on similarity. Defaults to 9.

ref.description: The site domain where AI recommendations should be displayed. Defaults to None.

num_articles_ref.description: The minimum number of articles to return from the specified reference domain (ref). Defaults to 0.

search_algorithm.description: The search algorithm to use for retrieving articles. Options: most_recent, semantic, most_recent_semantic, trending. Defaults to most_recent.
